meanings.sent1: The children will roup their toys before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: Let's roup all the books on the shelf to make space.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels decided to roup all the acorns in one spot for a squirrel party.
meanings.sent4: The students will roup their ideas to create a collaborative project.
meanings.sent5: The ants worked together to roup the food for the winter.

meanings.definition: A sale of miscellaneous household goods, clothing, etc.
meanings.sent1: We found some great deals at the roup in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The community center organized a roup to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to see what treasures I'll find at the roup this weekend.
meanings.sent4: The annual roup attracted many bargain hunters looking for unique items.
meanings.sent5: The roup had a variety of items, from furniture to toys, for sale.
